answers.author: Matthew Vanderhorst
answers.text:
The City of Montgomery has a sister city relationship with Neuilly-Plaisance, France.  With the exception of one city staff member, the Sister Cities Commission consists entirely of residents and other community members.  You can contact Faith Lynch at (513) 792-8358 for more information.

answers.author: Felicia Leonard
answers.text:
Good morning, 
The City of Clearwater has an active Sister City Advisory Board that advises the City Council.  I am attaching the ordinance and the Board rules and regulations. If you need more information, please feel free to call me at 727-562-4852

answers.author: Michael Van Milligen
answers.text:
The City of Dubuque has a Sister City Stearing Commmittee. Dubuque has three Sister Cities in China, Russia and Austria. City Clerk Kevin Firnstahl (563-589-4121, kfirnsta@cityofdubuque.org) is the contact person.


The City of Dubuque has a Sister City Stearing Commmittee. Dubuque has three Sister Cities in China, Russia and Austria. City Clerk Kevin Firnstahl (563-589-4121, kfirnsta@cityofdubuque.org) is the contact person.

answers.author: Jennifer Kimball
answers.text:
The Rockville Sister City Corporation (RSSC) is a nonprofit corporation organized in 1986 to support educational and charitable programs and to provide a continuing relationship between the citizens of Rockville and of our sister city Pinneberg, Germany.  RSSC is also in the process of developing a sister city relationship with Jiaxing, China.  More information on RSSC is available at http://www.rocknet.org/Community/SisterCities/
Jenny Kimball
Assistant City Manager
City of Rockville, MD

Jenny Kimball
Assistant City Manager
City of Rockville, MD

author: Gregory Stopka
text:
A member is looking for information on sister city steering committees.   Are there any examples of “citizen steering advisory committees” for cities that have a sister city?
Any help is greatly appreciated.
Greg Stopka, Central Regional Director
Alliance for Innovation
gstopka@transformgov.org
title: Sister Cities Committees
